title: A true gentleman
author: VD
content_html:
Since we’re on a musical note, I might as well burnish my libertarian credentials… this song always makes me happy:

There are certain things a man is just expected to do. Open the doors, kill the spiders, defend the weak, buy the drugs.

UPDATE: And just to make Nate happy.
